data.message: Nobody's talking about the real content.. but I feel you buddy.. I wonder if that engineer is still around the business.. Everybody makes mistakes but does he feel any regret though? Everybody says in their interviews you are a perfectionist in your work and I follow you since Relapse area, man. Share more stories, when you have time. Because tomorrow is not guarenteed, and when you are gone, those things will also be gone, and I know motherfuckers will try to use the past as how they want. You are the greatest! Would like to hear from you.. but, oh well, this is Stan :)
